if os.name == 'nt':
    pass # Windows

from time import strftime
import os

if os.name == 'nt': # Windows
    basePath = 'C:\\working\\'
else:
    basePath = '/working/'

Fn = '%sSetup%s.csv' % ( basePath, strftime( '%y%m%d' ) )
